bug.summary: [Doc] Inconsistent of param signature between AutoIAFNormal and affine_autoregressive
bug.description: Doc for AutoIAFNormal (<denchmark-link:http://docs.pyro.ai/en/stable/infer.autoguide.html#autoiafnormal>http://docs.pyro.ai/en/stable/infer.autoguide.html#autoiafnormal</denchmark-link> ) says hidden_dims is an int While <denchmark-link:http://docs.pyro.ai/en/stable/distributions.html?highlight=affine_autoregressive#affine-autoregressive>http://docs.pyro.ai/en/stable/distributions.html?highlight=affine_autoregressive#affine-autoregressive</denchmark-link> claims that hidden_dims should be a list of int. Is that a typo in AutoIAFNormal's doc?

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xidulu>@xidulu</denchmark-link> thanks for picking this up! Yes, I believe this is a bug in the docstring for . It should be . Are you able to submit a PR for this quick change?
